general.gigTitle: design and develop wordpress website using  elementor, divi, custom code

sellerCard.description:
Hi there! I'm Mahedi Hasan working in this industry for over 3 years, 250+ projects done in the local market and other markets. Experienced Developer Specializing in Full Stack Website Development & Hybrid Mobile App Development using Php, Javascript and Dart Language - Laravel, Node Js, Wordpress, Shopify, Flutter, React Native.

My work style is compleatly researched on market effectiveness, best quality modern code and design standards. Always i try to recommend and suggest the best thing which can be better, best for the project.

Client satisfaction is my main goal .

description.content:
If you want to design or develop your wordpress website then you are in the right place. I can perfectly design and develop your wordpress website using custom code or wordpress page builder like elementor, divi, wpbakery.


Its me, Mahedi Hasan, professional wordpress developer, who has 2+ years experience in wordpress development. I have done 140+ projects. So hope you will have a perfect deal.


Whats included in my service ?


  • Any kind of website design and development
  • Ecommerce development using woocommerce
  • Landing page website, agency, business
  • Custom theme development
  • Premium theme
  • Premium plugins
  • Premium features
  • Search Engine Friendly (SEO)
  • Image gallery, video gallery, slider if need
  • Social Media Integration - Facebook, Twitter etc
  • All Device responsive
  • Multiple Browser Compatibility
  • Security and ssl certificate install
  • Google map integration
  • Automatic backup system in google drive


Why Choose Me?


  • 24/7 full time support
  • 30 Days free support.
  • Provide screen record video or documentation
  • Unlimited Revision
  • 2+ years experience
  • More than 140+ completed projects
  • Satisfaction Guaranteed


Please contact me before placing the order.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What you need to design and develop wordpress website ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Firstly, I need your domain and hosting or cpanel or wordpress admin panel login information. If you do not have anything then i will guide you about domain, hosting etc.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you support me free after giving project done ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes i will. I will support you 1 month free.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will you guide me to control my website ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes i will and that will be free of cost. If need i will send screen record video or documentation.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you develop custom theme ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes if you need i can develop any kind of wordpress theme for you.

openGraph.title: design and develop wordpress website using  elementor, divi, custom code

reviews.comment: Working with Md Mahedi Hasan on website development was quite challenging. The quality of delivery lacked attention to detail and professionalism, falling short of my expectations. Communication was slow and ineffective, with a noticeable lack of understanding and proactiveness. I would not recommend him for building anything in Divi.

seller_response.comment: I think this is misunderstanding, i tried to complete first home page and planned to apply in others pages, when i asked changes finally then you told me for the isse as you giving me the feedback here. before it all were ok. anyway Thank you

reviews.comment: If you want a reliable developer for your WordPress, I boldly recommend him. He's a master at his stuff and delivered beyond expectations. I recommend him to anyone who needs WordPress task. Weldone bro, You deserve a better comment than this.

good working with satisfaction 
recommend him to everyone
Thank you very much for your good work!

seller_response.comment: Thank you so much for your friendly cooperation.
Thank you so much, I'm happy working with you.
